product_name: Sunday Afternoons Explorer Cap Sun Hat - Infant/Toddler Girls'
long_description: Kid-tested tough, the Sunday Afternoons Explorer Sun Hat for infants/toddler girls offers UV protection for young faces, ears and necks. Ultra lightweight nylon wicks moisture and offers UPF 50+ sun protection. Soft, floating 1.75 in. brim; attached neck cape. SmartStrap(R) breakaway chin strap. The Sunday Afternoons Explorer Sun Hat features a crown that adjusts 18 - 20 in.
